effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Protects the target's stats from being [lowered]{mechanic:lower} for the next five turns.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents stat changes in battle for five turns in battle.  Raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中　５ターンの　あいだ
味方の　能力を
さげられなくする　道具。

An item that prevents stat reduction
among the Trainer’s party Pokémon
for five turns after it is used in battle.

Per cinque turni dopo l’uso, evita che le
statistiche dei Pokémon della squadra
dell’Allenatore diminuiscano.

Evita que bajen las características del equipo
Pokémon durante cinco turnos.

Eine mögliche Statusveränderung der Pokémon
im Team wird für 5 Runden verhindert.

Empêche la baisse des stats de tous
les Pokémon de l’équipe pendant cinq tours.

배틀 중 5턴 동안
같은 편의 능력을
떨어뜨리지 않게 하는 도구.

せんとうちゅう　５ターンの　あいだ
みかたの　のうりょくを
さげられなくする　どうぐ。

An item that prevents stat reduction
among the Trainer’s party Pokémon
for five turns after use.

An item that prevents stat reduction
among the Trainer’s party Pokémon
for five turns after use.

Empêche la réduction des stats
de tous les Pokémon de l’équipe
pendant 5 tours.
